info.title: Wordpress.org Post API
info.description: This API provides an easy to use REST API, available via HTTP, allowing you to grab your sites data in simple JSON format, including users, posts, taxonomies and more.

parameters.name: author
parameters.description: Limit result set to posts assigned to specific authors.n                    n                    n                    n                        n                            Default:

parameters.name: author_exclude
parameters.description: Ensure result set excludes posts assigned to specific authors.n                    n                    n                    n                        n                            Default:

parameters.name: context
parameters.description: Scope under which the request is made; determines fields present in response.n                    n                    n                    n                        n                            Default: viewn                        n                    n                    n                        One of: view, embed, edit

parameters.name: exclude
parameters.description: Ensure result set excludes specific ids.n                    n                    n                    n                        n                            Default:

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Use WP Query arguments to modify the response; private query vars require appropriate authorization.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Limit result set to specific ids.n                    n                    n                    n                        n                            Default:

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset the result set by a specific number of items.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Order sort attribute ascending or descending.n                    n                    n                    n                        n                            Default: descn                        n                    n                    n                        One of: asc, desc

parameters.name: orderby
parameters.description: Sort collection by object attribute.n                    n                    n                    n                        n                            Default: daten                        n                    n                    n                        One of: date, id, include, title, slug

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Current page of the collection.n                    n                    n                    n                        n                            Default: 1

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Maximum number of items to be returned in result set.n                    n                    n                    n                        n                            Default: 10

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Limit results to those matching a string.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: Limit result set to posts with a specific slug.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Limit result set to posts assigned a specific status.n                    n                    n                    n                        n                            Default: publish

parameters.name: comment_status
parameters.description: One of: open, closed

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: One of: standard, aside, chat, gallery, link, image, quote, status, video, audio

parameters.name: ping_status
parameters.description: One of: open, closed

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: One of: publish, future, draft, pending, private

parameters.name: force
parameters.description: Whether to bypass trash and force deletion.

parameters.name: context
parameters.description: Scope under which the request is made; determines fields present in response.n                    n                    n                    n                        n                            Default: viewn                        n                    n                    n                        One of: view, embed, edit
